campuses.name: Main Campus
campuses.fullName: Surigao del Norte State University - Main Campus
campuses.address: Narciso St., Surigao City, Surigao del Norte

departments.name: College of Engineering and Information Technology
departments.description: The premier engineering and technology college offering cutting-edge programs in engineering and information technology fields.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering
courses.description: Focuses on the design, construction, and maintenance of infrastructure projects.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering
courses.description: Covers electrical systems, power generation, and electronic circuit design.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Electronics Engineering
courses.description: Specializes in electronic systems, telecommunications, and digital signal processing.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
courses.description: Combines computer science and electrical engineering principles for hardware and software integration.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
courses.description: Focuses on programming, algorithms, software development, and computational theory.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
courses.description: Emphasizes practical application of technology in business and organizational settings.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems
courses.description: Integrates business processes with information technology solutions.

departments.name: College of Arts and Sciences
departments.description: Provides foundational education in liberal arts, sciences, and humanities.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Mathematics
courses.description: Develops analytical and problem-solving skills through advanced mathematical concepts.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Environmental Science
courses.description: Studies environmental systems, conservation, and sustainable development practices.

courses.name: Bachelor of Arts in English Language
courses.description: Focuses on language, literature, communication, and critical thinking skills.

departments.name: College of Teacher Education
departments.description: Prepares future educators with pedagogical knowledge and teaching competencies.

courses.name: Bachelor of Elementary Education
courses.description: Prepares teachers for elementary education with child development focus.

courses.name: Bachelor of Physical Education
courses.description: Develops physical education teachers and sports professionals.

courses.name: Bachelor of Technical-Vocational Teacher Education
courses.description: Trains teachers for technical-vocational education with specialization in food services.

courses.name: Bachelor of Secondary Education - English
courses.description: Prepares secondary school English teachers with language and literature expertise.

courses.name: Bachelor of Secondary Education - Filipino
courses.description: Trains secondary school Filipino language and literature teachers.

courses.name: Bachelor of Secondary Education - Mathematics
courses.description: Develops secondary school mathematics teachers with strong computational skills.

courses.name: Bachelor of Secondary Education - Sciences
courses.description: Prepares secondary school science teachers across multiple science disciplines.

departments.name: College of Technology
departments.description: Offers technology-focused programs combining theoretical knowledge with practical skills.

courses.name: Bachelor of Engineering Technology
courses.description: General engineering technology program with broad technical foundation.

courses.name: Bachelor of Automotive Engineering Technology
courses.description: Specializes in automotive systems, maintenance, and engineering principles.

courses.name: Bachelor of Electrical Engineering Technology
courses.description: Applied electrical engineering with hands-on technical training.

courses.name: Bachelor of Electronics Engineering Technology
courses.description: Practical electronics engineering with industry-focused applications.

courses.name: Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering Technology - Mechanical Technology
courses.description: Mechanical engineering technology with focus on mechanical systems and manufacturing.

courses.name: Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering Technology - Refrigeration and Air-conditioning Technology
courses.description: Specializes in HVAC systems, refrigeration, and climate control technology.

courses.name: Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering Technology - Welding and Fabrication Technology
courses.description: Focuses on welding techniques, metal fabrication, and structural assembly.

courses.name: Bachelor in Industrial Technology - Architectural Drafting
courses.description: Technical drawing, CAD design, and architectural planning skills.

courses.name: Bachelor in Industrial Technology - Automotive Technology
courses.description: Automotive repair, maintenance, and diagnostic technology.

courses.name: Bachelor in Industrial Technology - Electrical Technology
courses.description: Electrical installation, maintenance, and industrial electrical systems.

courses.name: Bachelor in Industrial Technology - Electronics Technology
courses.description: Electronic device repair, circuit analysis, and digital systems.

courses.name: Bachelor in Industrial Technology - Mechanical Technology
courses.description: Machine operation, maintenance, and mechanical system technology.

courses.name: Bachelor in Industrial Technology - Heating, Ventilating & Air-conditioning Technology
courses.description: HVAC system installation, maintenance, and energy efficiency optimization.

courses.name: Bachelor in Industrial Technology - Welding & Fabrication Technology
courses.description: Advanced welding techniques, metal fabrication, and quality control.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management
courses.description: Hotel and restaurant management, customer service, and hospitality operations.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Tourism Management
courses.description: Tourism planning, destination management, and travel industry operations.
